meanings.definition: A person who operates or travels in an aircraft or balloon.
meanings.sent1: The brave aeronauts soared high in the sky in their hot air balloon.
meanings.sent2: The aeronauts piloted the airplane through the clouds with skill.
meanings.sent3: The aeronauts decided to have a picnic in the sky, floating on their balloon.
meanings.sent4: The aeronauts were like modern-day adventurers, exploring the heavens in their flying machines.
meanings.sent5: The aeronauts' passion for flying was evident in every graceful maneuver they made.

meanings.definition: The crew of a balloon or airship.
meanings.sent1: The aeronauts worked together to navigate the airship safely through the storm.
meanings.sent2: The skilled aeronauts managed the balloon's controls with precision.
meanings.sent3: The aeronauts had a friendly competition to see who could tie the best knot on the airship.
meanings.sent4: The aeronauts' teamwork was like a well-oiled machine, ensuring the smooth operation of the balloon.
meanings.sent5: The aeronauts' laughter filled the airship as they shared stories during their journey.
